name: CF Media
description:
At Client Focused Media, our name is our mission. We are devoted to the interests of our clients. We are committed to discovering and overcoming the key challenges that prevent a business from reaching its full potential. To put it simply, we will pursue what is best for you and your business.
We are the leading integrated marketing firm in Northeast Florida with extensive capabilities and experience providing strategic planning, marketing, creative, advertising, printing, branding, public relations and crisis communications services. At CFM, we know that focusing on details can drive positive results. Your dedicated integration team will ensure that nothing goes unnoticed. We create demand for our clients’ products and services through innovative and interactive marketing. Our branding platforms will speak to your key demographics. Our programs are designed to increase business, market share and brand equity.
